isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Inverter W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Power Inverter W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: When the Master ON/OFF Switch of the sleeper in the position (closed), power flows from B1 battery stud through circuits 14K, 14R, fusible link (2 - Blue 12GA), and circuit 14S to energize the sleeper magnetic switch. The ground path from the magnetic switch is circuit 11V, master ON/OFF switch, and circuit 11W to the sleeper box ground stud.

With the sleeper magnetic switch energized, power flows from the magnetic switch through circuit 14A, fuse M4, and circuit 80J to the power inverter. The ground path for the inverter is circuit 11X to the sleeper box ground stud.
